body: This author has amazing works. Yes. But if you’re reading this I’m letting you know almost none of them are fully translated in English. Several of the series are only half translated. It’s disappointing but what can you do. Unless you wanna pay a translator. These are really long series bro. Just wanted to give any potential readers a heads up just in case you really liked the style and wanted to see more from this author. There are very few complete English translations. In fact I only saw 1 that was finished. Multiple 20 chapter series stop half way. So you kinda have to be okay with the Japanese versions. This author’s works has had TONS of translation requests in the replies for series that are years old and they still aren’t translated so I wouldn’t get your hopes up either unless you’re going to pay for it :D
